subtitle: A treat for teatime or the lunchbox.

method.text: Grease and line an 18 cm square cake tin.
Melt the chocolate and butter in a heatproof bowl set over a saucepan of simmering water. Stir until melted.
Stir in the sugar then, using a metal spoon, fold in the flour. Add the vanilla essence and eggs, until evenly combined. Stir in the nuts.
Spoon the mixture into the prepared cake tin.
Bake for approximately 60-70 min. Cover the brownies with foil half way through if they become too brown.
Leave in the tin for 15 min before transferring to a cooling rack to cool completely. Dust with the icing sugar and drizzle over the remaining chocolate.
Cut into even squares before serving.

title: Pecan chocolate brownies
